original_text: Jesus has already gone in there. He has gone there before us, on our behalf. He has become our special priest for ever, in the same way that Melchizedek was God's priest.
korean_text: 그리로 앞서 가신 예수께서 멜기세덱의 반차를 따라 영원히 대제사장이 되어 우리를 위하여 들어 가셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus has already gone in there.
He has gone there before us,
He has become our special priest for ever,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 영원히 우리의 특별한 제사장이 되셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: in the same way that Melchizedek was God's priest.
sentences.korean_translation: 멜기세덱이 하나님의 제사장이었던 것과 같은 방식으로.
